title: Shake-speares sonnets Neuer before imprinted.
author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.
publisher: By G. Eld for T[homas] T[horpe] and are to be solde by Iohn Wright, dwelling at Christ Church gate,
notes: A title-page variant of the edition with imprint giving William Aspley as bookseller.
Contains a frontispiece port. of Shakespeare, from another item, and pasted in, signed: Martin Droeshout sculpsit London. -- Cf. Folger Lib. catalog.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
